Title: Metro Paint
Description: This is Metro Paint app which is a modern ui app for Windows 8 . To test it in your system you will need Visual Studio Express for Windows 8. Hope you love it.
HomeWiki:
This is a Modern UI app for Windows 8 Store . Its in Dev Preview right now . You can use the features as drawing circles , rectangles , lines , and writing with pencil . In this preview you can see many color options . To test it now download it now , please give me feedback to improve it.

Developed by
Maitreya Vyas

You can follow App's Facebook page to get latest updates on it
